title: Hope Union Clipless Pedals spin out dual-clip mechanism for easy entry, tuneable release
content:
Hope Technology have released three new clipless pedals for mountain biking, utilizing an all-new dual clip mechanism that uses its own specific cleat and is not cross compatible with other clipless systems.
